availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas H. Corbett (Ballard Co, Kentucky, attorney, Comwlth atty 1st Jud Distr 1860-61, State House Rep)

body.p: Blandville, Kentucky, attorney, commonwealth's attorney, and politician. Hickman County, Kentucky, native. Married to Rebecca Coil Corbett on December 22, 1853. Father of Jacob Corbett. Attended the Kentucky Military Institute. Studied law under Judge Bigger of Blandville. Admitted to the bar in 1852. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky representing Ballard and McCracken Counties from 1855 to 1857. Commonwealth's attorney for the 1st Judicial District in Ballard County from 1860 to 1861. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky representing Ballard and McCracken Counties from 1865 to 1875.

ab.bibl:
